channel.title: How to make an area non-pvp
channel.description: Someone help me make an area non-pvp?

item.title: How to make an area non-pvp
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:5, topic:322095”]Just make a method that makes a certain area wilderness

public boolean isWild() { return (absX >= Xcoord && absY <= 3181 Ycoord && absY >= Ycoord && absX <= Xcoord); } else { isWild = false; }

I made it up off the top of my head, I’m not going to give you my wilderness method.[/quote]

That wouldn’t work, you need an if-statement in order to have an else-statement.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an area non-pvp

isInwild method:

if(absX >= 3180 && absX <= 3190 && absY >= 3433 && absY <= 3477){
return false;
}

@LilXCj wrote:

Just make a method that makes a certain area wilderness

public boolean isWild() { return (absX >= Xcoord && absY <= 3181 Ycoord && absY >= Ycoord && absX <= Xcoord); } else { isWild = false; }

I made it up off the top of my head, I’m not going to give you my wilderness method.

item.source: How to make an area non-pvp

item.title: How to make an area non-pvp
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

For Czar base: nonwild() method.

For a delta just make your own method.

public boolean isNotInWilderness(){
    return (absX >= 3180 && absX <= 3181 && absY >= 3443 && absY <= 3447 ? true : false);
}

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an area non-pvp
